h2_title: Zhu Bajie Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter
content: In this form, he'll start by performing a series of charge attacks after stamping the ground to cause muddy geysers to erupt all around.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Zhu_Bajie_(Boss_Fight).md', within the main section titled 'Zhu Bajie (Boss Fight)', specifically from the subsection 'Zhu Bajie Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter'.
The content is as follows:
In this form, he'll start by performing a series of charge attacks after stamping the ground to cause muddy geysers to erupt all around.
